Data Fields
uart_attr_t Struct Reference
Stratify OS » Device Interface » Universal Asynchronous Receiver/Transmitter (UART)

UART Attribute Data Structure. More...

#include <uart.h>

Detailed Description

This structure defines how the control structure for opening or reconfiguring the UART port.

Data Fields

u8 pin_assign
 The GPIO configuration to use (see LPC17XXDEV)
 
u8 start
 The number of start bits.
 
u8 stop
 The number of stop bits.
 
u8 parity
 The type of parity.
 
u8 width
 The character width.
 
u32 baudrate
 The UART baudrate.
